h2.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 20px; line-height: 1.4; background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; border-width: 0px 0px 2px; border-top-style: initial; border-right-style: initial; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: initial; border-top-color: initial; border-right-color: initial; border-bottom-color: rgb(231, 154, 37); border-left-color: initial; border-image: initial; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1px; position: relative; text-align: center;

span.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

a.title: COVID-19 Information for Berrien RESA and Local Educators

img.title: COVID-19 Information for Berrien RESA and Local Educators

span.span: COVID-19 Information for Berrien RESA and Local Educators

div.span: Given the recent conversations surroundingCoronavirus Disease 2019(COVID-19), we felt this information shouldbe shared with our school family and the Berrien RESAservice area community.

span.style: font-size: medium; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(99, 90, 78);

div.span: All the information provided on our website was taken from the Michigan Department of Health and Human Services (MDHHS) or the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). This information is focused on preventing the spread of the disease, symptomsand what to do if you think you may be sick.More information is available on theBerrien

span.style: font-size: medium; background: transparent; box-sizing: inherit; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(39, 122, 136);
font-size: medium; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(99, 90, 78);

font-size: medium; background: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; box-sizing: inherit; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(39, 122, 136);

a.title: Michigan Department of Health and Human Services

span.style: font-size: medium; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(99, 90, 78);

font-size: medium; background: transparent; box-sizing: inherit; border-style: initial; border-color: initial; border-image: initial; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(39, 122, 136);
font-size: medium; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(99, 90, 78);

div.span: websites. You can also visitCOVID-19 Resources from Spectrum Health Lakeland.

span.style: background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;

strong.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

span.br: A novel coronavirus is a new coronavirus that has not been previously identified. The virus causing Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19), is not the same as the coronaviruses that commonly circulate among humansand cause mild illness, like the common cold.

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;
p.span: A diagnosis with Coronavirus 229E, NL63, OC43, or HKU1 is not the same as a COVID-19 diagnosis. Patients with COVID-19 will be evaluated and cared for differently than patients with common coronavirus diagnosis.

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;

strong.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

span.strong: Why is the disease being called the CoronavirusDisease 2019 (COVID-19)?
span.br: On February 11, 2020 the World Health Organizationannouncedan official name for the disease that is causing the 2019 novel Coronavirus outbreak, first identified in Wuhan China. The new name of this disease is Coronavirus disease 2019, abbreviated as COVID-19. In COVID-19, CO stands for corona, VI for virus, and D for disease. Formerly, this disease was referred to as 2019 novel Coronavirus or 2019-nCoV.

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;
p.span: There aremany typesof human coronaviruses including some that commonly cause mild upper-respiratory tract illnesses. COVID-19 is a new disease, caused be a novel (or new) coronavirus that has not previously been seen in humans. The name of this disease was selected following the World Health Organization (WHO)best practice for naming of new human infectious diseases.

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;

strong.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

span.br: Health experts are still learning the details about how this new coronavirus spreads. Other coronaviruses spread from an infected person to others through: the air by coughing and sneezing, close personal contact, such as touching or shaking hands, touching an object or surface with the virus on it, then touching your mouth, nose, or eyes, and in rare cases, contact with feces.

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;

strong.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

span.strong: What are the symptoms of theCOVID-19?
span.br: According to the CDC, patients withCOVID-19have reportedly had mild to severe respiratory illness. Symptoms can include:

ul.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; margin: -10px 0px 15px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: none;

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;
p.span: Symptoms may appear 2-14 days after exposure. If you have been in China within the past two weeks and develop symptoms, call your doctor.

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;
p.span: What are the symptoms of the Influenza as they differ a little fromCOVID-19?According to theCDC, common Influenza (flu) can cause mild to severe illness, and at times can lead to death. Flu is different from a cold. Flu usually comes on suddenly. People who have flu often feel some or all of these symptoms:

ul.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; margin: -10px 0px 15px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: none;

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;
p.span: Some people may have vomiting and diarrhea, though this is more common in children than adults.

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;
p.span: *Its important to note that not everyone with the flu will have a fever.

h2.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: 1.3; background: transparent; color: rgb(37, 120, 135); box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 6px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;
p.span: The CDC has provided some guidance on prevention that should be used for both the flu and coronavirus:

ul.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; margin: -10px 0px 15px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; list-style: none;

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
li.span: Washing/cleaning/sanitizing with soap and WARM water is fine, as long as you're washing hands for 20 seconds. No specific "special products" are needed.

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
li.span: Sanitizing gel is also fine, but note that it must be rubbed into the skin until it's dry.

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
li.span: Masks do not provide any benefit to healthy individuals, and if someone is exhibiting symptoms of coronavirus, they need to be isolated at home.

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;
li.span: Coughing or sneezing into a tissue, elbow or sleeve is recommended. Tissues should be immediately thrown away in trash receptacles.

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: disc;

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bolder; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bolder; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: if COVID-19 is spreading in your community. This is especially important for people who are a higher risk of getting sick.

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;
p.span: Thesesteps will support students and staff against common winter germs, including colds, seasonal flu and strep, in addition to COVID-19. They are smart practices for all individuals and organizations and we encourage families to follow the same practices at home.

p.style: background: transparent; color: rgb(99, 90, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; box-sizing: inherit; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;
p.span: Should theCOVID-19virus come to the Berrien RESAservice area, we will follow the direction of the state and Berrien County Health Department.

div.p:
It is the policy of the Berrien Regional Education Service Agency not to discriminate in its policies and practices with respect to compensation, terms, or conditions of employment because of an individual's race, color, religion, sex, national origin, height, weight, marital status, political belief, genetic information, disability or handicap which does not impair an individual's ability to perform adequately in that individual's particular position or activity.
Lynda Hurlow
Executive Director of Human Resources
Berrien RESA
711 St. Joseph Avenue
Berrien Springs, MI 49103
For procedural information, please review NEOLA Board Policy No. 2260.
Please note that some pages on the Berrien RESA website contain links to third-party sites (including social media platforms). Berrien RESA is not responsible for the online content or accessibility of third-party sites, which do not relate to Berrien RESA programs, services and activities.
